resources.string: Search News articles from The Guardian
Kindly enter something to get results
No results for this search, kindly enter another one
Do you want to delete this article from Favorites?

If you are not seeing any results, enter any term(e.g. tesla) to get the articles. If you have seen some articles, these are from your last search. You can change the language of the app from the upper action bar menu. If you want to see favorites, click on hamburger icon.
These are all the favorite articles from your last search. If you have not seen any entry in the favorite, you can add to favorite from the Article Detail activity.

This is the selected article details. You can read its complete description from the clicking on the link. You can add his article to favorites for the later read. If this article is already in the favorites, you can remove from the favorites
